description: Instrument performance, theory, composition, and audio production.

subdomains.description: Piano technique, sight-reading, classical and contemporary repertoire.
Acoustic and electric guitar, fingerstyle, strumming, and soloing.
Percussion technique, rhythm, rudiments, and kit drumming.
Vocal technique, breathing, pitch control, and performance.
Harmony, scales, chord progressions, and musical analysis.
Songwriting, arrangement, orchestration, and creative process.
DAWs, mixing, mastering, and electronic music creation.
Bass guitar and upright bass technique, groove, and theory.
Violin, viola, cello, and orchestral string techniques.
Trumpet, trombone, horn, and brass performance techniques.
Flute, clarinet, saxophone, and woodwind performance.
Synthesizers, MIDI, electronic composition, and sound design.

description: Programming languages, software architecture, and application development.

subdomains.description: Python programming, scripting, automation, and frameworks like Django/Flask.
JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern ECMAScript features.
HTML, CSS, React, Vue, Angular, responsive design, and user interfaces.
Server-side development, REST APIs, GraphQL, databases, and microservices.

CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, infrastructure as code, and cloud deployment.
Java programming, Spring framework, enterprise applications, and JVM.
C# programming, .NET framework, ASP.NET, and Unity development.
C++ programming, systems programming, game engines, and performance optimization.
Rust systems programming, memory safety, and concurrent applications.
Go programming, concurrent systems, and cloud-native applications.
Functional programming with Haskell, Scala, Elixir, or F#.

description: Statistical analysis, machine learning, data engineering, and data visualization.

subdomains.description: Machine learning algorithms, model training, and supervised/unsupervised learning.
